name: Moby Prince, The Mistery of Livorno (SCRIPTED VIDEO)
name_original: Moby Prince, The Mistery of Livorno (SCRIPTED VIDEO)
description: April 10, 1991, the Moby Prince ferry leaves Livorno, there are 141 people on board, but after a fire caused by a collision with an oil tanker, only one will survive. 30 years have passed and the truth is still unknown
